author: cvuosalo
body:
#### PR description:

The recently merged #27907 added a new version of `DDSolidShape`. However, #27886 requires that there be only one `DDSolidShape`, and it is used by both old and new DD. This PR comments out the new `DDSolidShape`. After the DD4hep migration is finished, the old `DDSolidShape` can be eliminated and replaced with the new one.

Please merge this PR promptly because it is needed by #27886.

#### PR validation:

The changes in this PR are compile-time only. Compilation was successful.

No backport.
title: Remove second DDSolidShape until migration is over
